system.requirements: Tier 3: Shared Destiny, Shield of Contempt, Hatred (any). Aptitudes: Defence, Leadership
system.effect:
Whenever Character or Ally within 10m gains Corruption, reduce amount gained by 1 (min 0). Allies within 10m can spend a Fate Point to automatically gain 0 Corruption. 
Effects don't stack if multiple characters with this talent overlap their ranges.
